title: 22 Minute Full Body Gentle Yoga Practice for Beginners and Athletes
description:
This is a 22 minute full body gentle yoga practice for beginners. Ideal for athletes and easy days to recover, stretch and strengthen.
🧘 Breathe and Flow yoga wolfpack platform (free 7 day trial!): https://practice.breatheandflow.yoga
🌈 Daily yoga 30 day calendars: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/ritual

00:00 Intro
00:20 Practice

We get all our music from Epidemic Sound: https://bit.ly/2VyiGL1

***

Breathe and Flow is a yoga and lifestyle channel owned by Bre and Flo Niedhammer. Knowing that the body benefits from movement while the mind benefits from stillness, we share our philosophy of mental stillness through the fluidity of a strong practice. Bre and Flo are Registered Yoga Teachers (RYT) with Yoga Alliance® holding the highest certifications as E-RYT500, and are also Yoga Alliance Continuing Education Providers (YACEP). Combined they are trained in Vinyasa yoga, Hatha yoga, Yin yoga, Myofascial Release (MFR), pre- and postnatal yoga, Functional Movement, Animal Flow, Kinstretch, Functional Range Conditioning (FRC) mobility training, Functional Range Assessment (FRA) and Anatomy Trains Structural. Bre and Flo have taught at several premium yoga studios for many years and are teaching their teacher trainings, retreats, and workshops around the world. They currently live in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. Learn more about them and their certifications on their website: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/about

Our disclaimer: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/disclaimer

#breatheandflow #yoga #yogawithbnf

comments:
Short and sweet practice for beginners, athletes or just to take it easy today! Do what feels good ❤Who noticed the tile falling from the roof, almost into the window? 😂
🧘Truly deepen your practice with our Breathe and Flow wolfpack platform: https://practice.breatheandflow.yoga

Just started 2024 with a new yoga practice as a beginner and I realised how rigid my body had become from years of weight training without keeping up stretching. I definitely thanked myself for starting the new year off right with yoga because all the tension in my body needs releasing 😊🙏

44th time watching this... I can touch my feet standing up for the st time in 27 years.

Thank you!

It's about my fourth time doing this routine, I already see myself getting better and a bit more flexible, too. I also realised that now that I'm familiar with the exercises I can take my glasses off and close my eyes and this has been one of the most relaxing experiences I've had. It's still a bit difficult for me, but I can see progress, slowly but surely. Totally recommend.
Literally changed my life, suffered back pain for years! two weeks after doing this routine daily i'm pain free and feel ten years younger, thanks so much
